Challenges.ChallengeDef.label: Reach 10 colonists
Challenges.ChallengeDef.description: Have 10 colonists at the same time

Challenges.ChallengeDef.label: Reach 20 colonists
Challenges.ChallengeDef.description: Have 20 colonists at the same time. Can you manage this to happen?

Challenges.ChallengeDef.label: Reach 50 colonists
Challenges.ChallengeDef.description: Have 20 colonists at the same time. Is it possible at all?

Challenges.ChallengeDef.label: Kill 100 animals
Challenges.ChallengeDef.description: You need some fresh meat to feed your growing colony. It's easy to get it from wildlife around.

Challenges.ChallengeDef.label: Kill 500 animals
Challenges.ChallengeDef.description: Roll up your sleeves, theres a lot of shooting practice expected!

Challenges.ChallengeDef.label: Kill 1000 animals
Challenges.ChallengeDef.description: Actually, you can make a lot of apparel from all this skin!

Challenges.ChallengeDef.label: Kill all animals
Challenges.ChallengeDef.description: Just clean up the map from all animals. That's enough of them eating your crops, getting mad and attacking colonists. And don't forget your pets, 'cause I have allergy.
Challenges.ChallengeDef.applicability: Only available on maps with a lot of wildlife.

Challenges.ChallengeDef.label: Kill 25 people
Challenges.ChallengeDef.description: Your settlement suffers from raids, let's have you gratified for beating those burglars.

Challenges.ChallengeDef.label: Kill 100 people
Challenges.ChallengeDef.description: Your settlement suffers from raids, let's have you gratified for beating those burglars.

Challenges.ChallengeDef.label: Kill 500 people
Challenges.ChallengeDef.description: Your settlement suffers from raids, let's have you gratified for beating those burglars.

Challenges.ChallengeDef.label: Mine Out 100 Tiles
Challenges.ChallengeDef.description: Yo dwarves! There is some rock ahead! Mine out 100 blocks of rock.
Challenges.ChallengeDef.applicability: Only available on maps with high hills or mountains

Challenges.ChallengeDef.label: Mine Out All Resources
Challenges.ChallengeDef.description: Mine out all of resources hidden in rocks on the map
Challenges.ChallengeDef.applicability: Only available on maps with high hills or mountains

Challenges.ChallengeDef.label: Mine Out All
Challenges.ChallengeDef.description: Don't leave a single mineable rock tile!
Challenges.ChallengeDef.applicability: Only available on maps with high hills or mountains

Challenges.ChallengeDef.label: Become a master
Challenges.ChallengeDef.description: Teach one of your colonists to be a master (level 14) in some skill

Challenges.ChallengeDef.label: Become a Legendary Master
Challenges.ChallengeDef.description: Teach one of your colonists to be a legendary master (level 20) in some skill

Challenges.ChallengeDef.label: Outshine Michelangelo
Challenges.ChallengeDef.description: Build a legendary masterpiece sculpture, the one of unpreceded beauty and market value.

Challenges.ChallengeDef.label: Make "Haute Couture"
Challenges.ChallengeDef.description: Create apparel of legendary beauty, dress the colonist to the envy of all guests.

Challenges.ChallengeDef.label: Own small zoo
Challenges.ChallengeDef.description: Own a small zoo of different kinds of animals, 1/4 of possible. Tame or buy them, or just hold them in enclosure.

Challenges.ChallengeDef.label: Own medium zoo
Challenges.ChallengeDef.description: Own a medium-sized zoo with 1/2 of all kinds of animals possible in the game

Challenges.ChallengeDef.label: Own ultimate zoo
Challenges.ChallengeDef.description: Own a zoo of all kinds of animals possible in the game
